languages.text: "Я вижу волнение и страх прислуги подле меня. Но вы... Как у вас получается заглушать их цвета одними словами? Их темные оттенки сразу растворяются, и наступает смирение".
"I can see the agitation and fear of the servants beside me, but you... How do you manage to drown out their colours with mere words? Their dark hues dissolve immediately, and humility sets in."
languages.original_text: "Я вижу волнение и страх прислуги подле меня. Но вы... Как у вас получается заглушать их цвета одними словами? Их темные оттенки сразу растворяются, и наступает смирение".

traits.locale_text: "I can see the agitation and fear of the servants beside me, but you... How do you manage to drown out their colours with mere words? Their dark hues dissolve immediately, and humility sets in."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “我可以直接看到所有仆人的不安与恐惧，可是你……只凭三言两语，就能将他们阴暗的色彩化作恭谨的谦卑，这是怎么做到的呢？”
languages.original_text: "I can see the agitation and fear of the servants beside me, but you... How do you manage to drown out their colours with mere words? Their dark hues dissolve immediately, and humility sets in."

traits.locale_text: “我可以直接看到所有仆人的不安与恐惧，可是你……只凭三言两语，就能将他们阴暗的色彩化作恭谨的谦卑，这是怎么做到的呢？”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Les serviteurs qui m'entourent sont toujours en émoi... Comment faites-vous pour calmer leurs couleurs ainsi ? En quelques mots, vous parvenez à dissiper les nuances sombres qui les entourent pour laisser place à une profonde humilité. »
languages.original_text: "I can see the agitation and fear of the servants beside me, but you... How do you manage to drown out their colours with mere words? Their dark hues dissolve immediately, and humility sets in."

traits.locale_text: « Les serviteurs qui m'entourent sont toujours en émoi... Comment faites-vous pour calmer leurs couleurs ainsi ? En quelques mots, vous parvenez à dissiper les nuances sombres qui les entourent pour laisser place à une profonde humilité. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich sehe die Unruhe und Angst der Diener in meiner Nähe, doch Ihr ... Wie gelingt es Euch, ihre Farben durch bloße Worte zu übertönen? Ihre dunklen Töne lösen sich unverzüglich auf und Demut setzt ein."
languages.original_text: "I can see the agitation and fear of the servants beside me, but you... How do you manage to drown out their colours with mere words? Their dark hues dissolve immediately, and humility sets in."

traits.locale_text: "Ich sehe die Unruhe und Angst der Diener in meiner Nähe, doch Ihr ... Wie gelingt es Euch, ihre Farben durch bloße Worte zu übertönen? Ihre dunklen Töne lösen sich unverzüglich auf und Demut setzt ein."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「私の横にいる使用人たちが動揺し、恐れているのがわかりますが…あなたは言葉だけで、どうやって彼らの色をかき消すのです？その暗い色合いはすぐに消え去り、謙虚さが生まれます」
languages.original_text: "I can see the agitation and fear of the servants beside me, but you... How do you manage to drown out their colours with mere words? Their dark hues dissolve immediately, and humility sets in."

traits.locale_text: 「私の横にいる使用人たちが動揺し、恐れているのがわかりますが…あなたは言葉だけで、どうやって彼らの色をかき消すのです？その暗い色合いはすぐに消え去り、謙虚さが生まれます」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Veo la agitación y el miedo de los sirvientes que me rodean, pero usted... ¿cómo logra que sus palabras ahoguen sus colores? Los tonos oscuros desaparecen y la humildad ocupa su lugar».
languages.original_text: "I can see the agitation and fear of the servants beside me, but you... How do you manage to drown out their colours with mere words? Their dark hues dissolve immediately, and humility sets in."

traits.locale_text: «Veo la agitación y el miedo de los sirvientes que me rodean, pero usted... ¿cómo logra que sus palabras ahoguen sus colores? Los tonos oscuros desaparecen y la humildad ocupa su lugar».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "I can see the agitation and fear of the servants beside me, but you... How do you manage to drown out their colours with mere words? Their dark hues dissolve immediately, and humility sets in."

languages.text: "Yanımdaki hizmetkârların gerginliğini ve korkusunu sezebiliyorum ama sen... Renklerini alelade kelimelerle bastırmayı nasıl başarabiliyorsun? Karanlık tonları anında dağılıyor ve yerini tevazu alıyor."
languages.original_text: "I can see the agitation and fear of the servants beside me, but you... How do you manage to drown out their colours with mere words? Their dark hues dissolve immediately, and humility sets in."

traits.locale_text: "Yanımdaki hizmetkârların gerginliğini ve korkusunu sezebiliyorum ama sen... Renklerini alelade kelimelerle bastırmayı nasıl başarabiliyorsun? Karanlık tonları anında dağılıyor ve yerini tevazu alıyor."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
